20101227153933.000|20101227153935.000|CC1|TIME IN ST. LOUIS BOTH WRITING  
20101227153935.000|20101227153939.000|CC1|THE BOOK AND SINCE IT'S BEEN

20101227153956.000|20101227153958.000|CC1|OFF IN THE JURY TRIAL.          
20101227153958.000|20101227154002.000|CC1|SO I CHATTED WITH A FEW PEOPLE  
20101227154002.000|20101227154006.000|CC1|IN ST. LOUIS IN THIS GO-AROUND, 
20101227154006.000|20101227154007.000|CC1|AND THEY THINK THERE'S A LITTLE
